entries.agility_tooltip: Increase the chance when attacked you will be hit for minimum damage.
entries.badges_all: Congratulations! You have won every badge!
entries.constitution_tooltip: Gain 8 points of Health and 2 points of Action per point of Constitution.
entries.defense_melee_tooltip: Melee Defense = \>100Base Melee Defense + Weapon Type Defense \>100e.g.  melee defense + pistol defense
entries.defense_ranged_tooltip: Ranged Defense = \>100Base Ranged Defense + Weapon Type Defense \>100e.g. ranged defense + pistol defense
entries.force_accuracy_tooltip: Force Accuracy = \>100Base Ranged Accuracy + Force Accuracy \>100e.g.  ranged accuracy + force accuracy
entries.force_header_tooltip: This area displays your force ratings in accuracy, speed, and defense.
entries.force_speed_tooltip: Force Speed = \>100Base Ranged Speed + Force Speed \>100e.g.  ranged_speed + force_speed
entries.help_attributes: This is your Character Sheet.    It shows basic information about your character, such as your health, faction status, and guild affiliation.  This table displays your attributes, such as your Health, Action, and Mind.  Wounds are also displayed.  Wounds lower an attribute's maximum value.  Wounds can be healed at hospitals or cantinas, or by skilled players.
entries.help_badges: This is a list of the badges that you have earned.  Badges are granted for completing certain in-game actions.
entries.help_bio: This is your biography.  Other players see this when they examine you.
entries.help_factions: This page displays your current faction alignment, and what faction points you've earned with both the Rebels and Imperials.  These points affect how NPC's interact with you and can be spent for benefits like specialized weapons or armor.
entries.help_personalinfo: Personal information, such as your birth date, bind location, and marriage status are listed here.
entries.help_shockwounds: This is the number of battle fatigue points that you currently have.  Battle fatigue makes it more difficult to heal.  This fatigue must be healed by an Entertainer, Dancer or Musician in a Cantina, Hotel, Tavern, or Theater.
entries.help_statmigration: This button opens the stat migration page, where you can modify your maximum attribute values.
entries.help_stomach: You can eat and drink food which can give you temporary benefits.  Once your stomach is full, you'll have to wait until you can eat again.
entries.image_design_note: IMPORTANT NOTE!  Stat migration targets set in this window will NOT be applied until you visit an Image Designer.  These targets will be used when an Image Designer migrates your stats.
entries.luck_tooltip: Increases the likelihood you will have Lucky events happen to you. These events can happen while in combat or healing and while selling to junk dealers.
entries.offense_accuracy_tooltip: Accuracy = \>100Weapon Class Accuracy + Weapon Type Accuracy \>100e.g. Ranged Accuracy + Pistol Accuracy
entries.offense_speed_tooltip: Speed = \>100Weapon Class Speed + Weapon Type Speed \>100e.g. Ranged Speed + Pistol Speed
entries.precision_tooltip: Increases the chance you will hit for max with a ranged weapon.
entries.show_details_tooltip: Turns on more detailed display of your abilities.
entries.stamina_tooltip: Gain 2 points of Health and 8 points of Action per point of Stamina.
entries.statmig_usealltpoints: You must assign all of your attribute points.
entries.strength_tooltip: Increases the chance you will hit for max with a melee weapon.
entries.tooltip_health_wounds: Wounds subtract, temporarily, from your maximum health score.  For example, if your max health is normally 2000, and you have 100 wounds, you now have a maximum health of 1900.  Wounds can be removed by a doctor, at a medical center, or at a camp.
